item.title: 昙花一现的 "备忘录 "瞬间让一些股票交易者狂喜不已
item.description: 备忘录股票的复兴几乎在开始的同时就结束了。【原文：The meme-stock revival was over almost as quickly as it began.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将从厄尔尼诺影响非洲国家的 6000 万美元赔款中获得一半以上的资金
item.description: 厄尔尼诺现象引发的干旱已经导致玉米减产，并导致非洲国家宣布进入灾难状态，津巴布韦将从预计为非洲四国提供的 6000 万美元保险赔款中获得一半以上的赔偿。【原文：Zimbabwe will get over half of an expected $60 million insurance pay out meant for four African nations as it reels from the impact of El Niño-induced drought that’s already slashed corn output and led to a state of disaster being declared.】

item.title: 贷款期限临近，国际米兰老板抨击债权人橡树公司
item.description: 国际米兰的所有者称，其债权人橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）缺乏 "有意义的参与"，无法为这家意大利足球俱乐部迫在眉睫的债务问题找到解决方案。【原文：Inter Milan’s owner says its creditor Oaktree Capital Management has lacked “meaningful engagement” to find a solution for the Italian football club’s looming debt obligations.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 FBC 控股公司收购渣打银行部门
item.description: 津巴布韦 FBC 控股有限公司已完成对渣打银行在南部非洲国家业务的收购。【原文：Zimbabwe’s FBC Holdings Ltd. has completed the acquisition of Standard Chartered Plc’s business in the southern African country.】

item.title: 从东京到纽约，全球股市屡创新高
item.description: 从纽约到伦敦再到东京，如果说全球股市有什么相似之处的话，那就是：屡创新高。【原文：From New York to London to Tokyo, if there’s one similarity among the world’s equity markets it’s this: record highs.】

item.title: S&P利润回升得益于大型科技公司和强劲的消费者需求
item.description: 现在，美国企业的财报季已经接近尾声，但从中可以看出：许多公司都表示，去年最严重的利润困境已经过去。【原文：Now that Corporate America’s earnings season is drawing to a close, the takeaway is clear: A broad swath of companies say the worst of last year’s profit pain is over.】

item.title: 里克-里德尔对通货膨胀和美联储加息的反向观点
item.description:
他说，随着富裕的美国人获得更高的收益率，2%的目标看起来更加艰难

。【原文：

That 2% target looks tougher as affluent Americans reap higher yields, he says

】

item.title: 盎格鲁收购传奇耗时已久，必和必拓就改进出价展开辩论
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）以 430 亿美元收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的时间已经不多了，它面临着一个关键问题：如何才能在未来几天内将这家较小的公司吸引到谈判桌前？【原文：With time running out on its $43 billion pursuit of Anglo American Plc, BHP Group faces a critical question: what would it take to draw the smaller company to the negotiating table within the next few days?】

item.title: 法新社报道：油轮在也门沿海被导弹击中
item.description: 据法新社报道，一艘油轮在也门沿海被导弹击中。【原文：An oil tanker was hit by a missile off the coast of Yemen, Agence France-Presse reported.】

item.title: 中国称农业部长唐仁健正在接受调查
item.description: 据中国反渎职监察机构周六发表的声明，中国农业农村部部长唐仁健因 "涉嫌严重违纪违法 "接受调查。【原文：Tang Renjian, China’s minister of agriculture and rural affairs, is under investigation for “suspected serious violations of discipline and law,” according to a statement from China’s anti-graft watchdog on Saturday.】

item.title: 气候活动人士短暂中断慕尼黑机场运营
item.description: 作为呼吁政府采取更多行动减少温室气体排放活动的一部分，气候活动人士进入了机场跑道，导致慕尼黑机场在周六早些时候关闭了几个小时。【原文：Munich Airport was closed for some hours early Saturday after climate activists accessed the runway as part of a campaign calling for more government action against greenhouse emissions.】

item.title: 欧洲人口老龄化成为部分投资者的 "吸金磁石
item.description: 长期以来，欧洲人口的不断减少引发了人们对其经济前景的担忧。各国政府对此忧心忡忡。埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对这一趋势发出了警告。但对某些人来说，这正在变成一桩大生意。【原文：Europe’s shrinking population has long raised concerns about its economic prospects. Governments are seriously worried about it. Elon Musk has raised alarm about the trend. But for some, it’s turning into big business.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚大学和芝加哥大学校园发生逮捕事件，大学紧张局势再度升级
item.description: 周五晚上，警方驱散了试图占领宾夕法尼亚大学和芝加哥大学大楼的抗议者，因为以色列-哈马斯战争引发的紧张局势再次在大学校园内爆发。【原文：Police removed protesters who were attempting to occupy buildings at the University of Pennsylvania and University of Chicago Friday night, as tensions over the Israel-Hamas War once again flared up across college campuses.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：大宗商品超级周期如何终结
item.description:
两位市场大师的发言。【原文：

Two masters of the market speak.

】

item.title: 雨季对这些印度股票来说是个好消息
item.description: 由于交易商押注丰沛的季风降雨将提高农作物产量并刺激农村需求，因此大部分收入来自印度腹地的印度公司股票出现了复苏迹象。【原文：Stocks of Indian firms that earn a large chunk of their revenues from the nation’s hinterland are showing signs of a revival, as traders bet that bountiful monsoon rains will lead to better crop yields and boost rural demand.】

item.title: 失败的加密货币公司创世获准偿还债权人数十亿美元
item.description: 破产的加密货币贷款机构创世全球资本公司（Genesis Global Capital）向债权人分配数十亿美元数字资产和现金的计划获得法院批准，从而击败了其母公司数字货币集团（Digital Currency Group）提出的法律挑战。【原文：Bankrupt crypto lender Genesis Global Capital won court approval of its plan to distribute billions of dollars in digital assets and cash to creditors, defeating a legal challenge brought by its corporate parent Digital Currency Group.】

item.title: 阿根廷总统米莱伊计划五月底与扎克伯格会面
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊计划于 5 月底在硅谷会见 Meta Platforms Inc.首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）和其他科技巨头的领导人。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei is planning to meet with Meta Platforms Inc. CEO Mark Zuckerberg and other leaders of tech giants in Silicon Valley at the end of May, people with direct knowledge said.】

item.title: 新日铁加大力度招揽美国钢铁工人和政界人士
item.description: 尽管遭到工会领袖和拜登政府的强烈反对，新日本制铁公司仍在加紧努力，争取美国工人和政界人士支持其斥资 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. is stepping up efforts to win over US workers and politicians for its $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp. despite stiff opposition from union leaders and the Biden administration.】

item.title: VIX 指数收于 2019 年以来最低点，S&P 500 指数走高
item.description: 根据一项衡量期权价值的重要指标，交易员对股市剧烈波动的担忧程度是自 19 世纪科威德大流行之前最低的。【原文：Traders are the least concerned about wild stock market swings since before the Covid-19 pandemic, according to a key gauge of options values.】

item.title: 消费物价指数报告发布前，资产支持债券销售迎来 2024 年最好的一周
item.description: 在通胀报告给市场带来更多不确定性之前，企业纷纷寻求借贷，因此本周资产支持证券市场充斥着大量发行的债券，是今年以来出售债券最多的一周。【原文：Companies flooded the asset-backed securities market with offerings this week, selling the most bonds this year as they looked to borrow before inflation reports added extra uncertainty to markets.】

item.title: 纽约电网今夏高峰电力需求将上升 10
item.description: 纽约电网预测，在去年异常温和的天气之后，今年夏天该州的高峰电力需求将增加 10%。【原文：The New York grid is forecasting that peak power demand for the state will increase 10% this summer after unusually mild weather last year.】

item.title: 出售欧洲债券后，象牙海岸的信用评级获得 S&P 确认
item.description: 象牙海岸的主权信用评级得到了 S&P Global Ratings 的确认，今年早些时候的欧元债券销售为其财政提供了支持。【原文：Ivory Coast’s sovereign credit rating was affirmed by S&P Global Ratings after a eurobond sale earlier this year bolstered its finances.】

item.title: 尽管利率高企，华尔街的风险偏好依然强劲
item.description: 对于华尔街的守旧派来说，这似乎是不可避免的。一旦债券重新开始提供体面的回报，人们就会失去利率为零时对风险的嗜好。【原文：To Wall Street’s old guard, it had seemed inevitable. Once bonds started offering decent payouts again, people would lose the taste for risk that flourished when rates were zero.】

item.title: 科林西亚申请驳回霸菱关于挖角的诉讼
item.description: 今年 3 月从霸菱挖走 20 多名员工的新兴私人信贷管理公司 Corinthia Global Management 已请求法官驳回该资产管理公司对其提起的诉讼。【原文：Corinthia Global Management, the upstart private credit manager that poached more than 20 employees from Barings in March, has asked a judge to dismiss the asset manager’s lawsuit against it.】

item.title: 高盛担心零售人群回流导致业绩不佳
item.description: 本周股市在历史高点附近徘徊，题材股先扬后抑，交易员正密切关注散户资金流入股市的情况。【原文：Traders are keeping a close eye on flows into equities from the retail crowd as stocks hover near record highs and meme stocks popped and then fizzled this week.】

item.title: KKR 投资的输油管道可能出售 29 亿美元债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，加拿大西部的管道项目 Coastal GasLink LP 正在与投资者商谈可能出售巨型高等级债券的事宜。【原文：Coastal GasLink LP, a pipeline project in Western Canada, is talking to investors about a possible jumbo high-grade bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官为 Citgo 的最终竞标扫清道路，PDVSA 遭受挫折
item.description: 法官为 Citgo 石油公司美国母公司的最终出价扫清了障碍，驳回了委内瑞拉国有石油公司对法院下令出售该炼油厂的竞标程序的反对意见。【原文：A judge cleared the way for final offers for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s US parent, denying objections from Venezuela’s state-owned oil company to the bidding process for the oil refiner’s court-ordered sale.】

item.title: 乌拉圭在新规则下的首次 IPO 定于 6 月进行，科技公司将参与其中
item.description: 根据两年前出台的简化规定，乌拉圭的首次公开募股预计将于 6 月底启动，这将考验投资者对南美国家科技行业的投资热情。【原文：Uruguay’s first initial public offering under streamlined regulations introduced two years ago is expected to launch in late June, testing investor appetite for the South American country’s tech sector.】

item.title: Vanguard 新首席执行官必须赢得博格海德的心
item.description:
萨利姆-拉姆吉在关键时刻执掌大权。【原文：

Salim Ramji takes the reins during a pivotal moment.

】

item.title: 麦肯锡校友领导的印度基金融资额创历史新高
item.description: Kedaara Capital 打破了印度私募股权公司的模式，创纪录地筹集了 17 亿美元，使其与多年来在该领域占据主导地位的财大气粗的全球公司平起平坐。【原文：Kedaara Capital has broken the mold for Indian private equity firms, raising a record $1.7 billion to put it on par with the deep-pocketed global players that have dominated the space for years.】
